description: Brighton 0-3 Aston Villa: Did you know?
title: Brighton 0-3 Aston Villa: Did you know?
title_page: Brighton 0-3 Aston Villa: Did you know? - BBC Sport
maintext: Marco Asensio has scored eight goals in his past seven appearances for Aston Villa in all competitions. In fact, since his debut for the Villans he's scored more goals than any other Premier League player (eight in all competitions).
